subject: Economy
question_en: What is the total Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of Rajasthan in 2020?
question_hi: 2020 सेवारित ग्रॉसिड अंक्स (GDP) राजस्थान की, किस वर्ष में थी ?
explanation_en: The total GDP of Rajasthan in 2020 was Rs. 126,750 crore.
